Text: Great download. Does anyone have The Passion (by same author) in audiobook?

It's called "The Passage", but, no, I don't have it. I had to read it. Am halfway through reading "The Twelve" when I just discovered this. And it's being read by Scott Brick, one of my favorite readers.  Now I'm torn. Should I finish reading or start listening...hmm...either way I'm downloading...THANKS!
